segments.text: I see the light spilling in from the window, illuminating the kitchen with a warm glow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It creates a stark contrast to the messy reality of the puddle forming on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so peaceful, lost in her task, while danger lurks just behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks determined as he reaches for the cookies; it's both cute and concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister’s eager expression captures a moment of childhood that is so fleeting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I can’t shake this nagging feeling that something terrible could happen at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a beautiful day outside; how can everything feel so precarious inside?
segments.speaker: PAR
